szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.arena

Class PlayerGameProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.arena.PlayerGameProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActorManagerBasic, GameLevelBasic, PlayerManagerBasic, PlayerGameInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActorGameProxy

    public class PlayerGameProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayerGameInterface
    Created by developer on 5.12.2016. Used as a proxy object to make it impossible for the player to access methods of the game gameInterface he/she has no authorization to access (registerActor(), unregisterActor(), update()) by downcasting the reference to the game gameInterface from PlayerGameInterface to ActorGameInterface. This is therefore to prevent cheating on part of the player.

      • getActorsBySearchCriteria

        public java.util.Set<ActorBasic> getActorsBySearchCriteria(java.util.function.Predicate<ActorBasic> predicate)
        Description copied from interface: ActorManagerBasic
        Queries the set of all currently active game actors (meaning actors whose act() method is still called) and returns a subset of them satisfying the criteria passed as argument. If no criteria is passed (null is passed) it returns all game actors
        Specified by:
        getActorsBySearchCriteria in interface ActorManagerBasic
        Parameters:
        predicate - a functional interface or lambda function used in evaluating whether the actor should be included in the query results. If null is passed, all game actors are returned.
        Returns:
        a set of all game actors satisfying the criteria specified.
